targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    status,
    count() / ($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND env                   == $env,                  $env)
  $conditionalTest(AND hostname              == $hostname,             $hostname)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_subnet_id          == $subnet_id,            $subnet_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_node_id            == $replica_id,           $replica_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_canister_id        == '$canister_id',        $canister_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND geo_country_code      == $client_country_code,  $client_country_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND status                IN ($status_code),        $status_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND is_bot                == $is_bot,               $is_bot)
GROUP BY t, status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=HTTP Metrics, user=0 */
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 30) * 30) * 1000 as t,
    status,
    count() / (30000 / 1000)
FROM default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1740989023) AND date <= toDateTime(1740999823)
   AND env                   == 'prod' 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
GROUP BY t, status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    status,
    median(0.50)(request_time_ms) AS p50
FROM $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  $conditionalTest(AND env                   == $env,                  $env)
  $conditionalTest(AND hostname              == $hostname,             $hostname)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_subnet_id          == $subnet_id,            $subnet_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_node_id            == $replica_id,           $replica_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_canister_id        == '$canister_id',        $canister_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND geo_country_code      == $client_country_code,  $client_country_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND status                IN ($status_code),        $status_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND is_bot                == $is_bot,               $is_bot)
GROUP BY t, status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
    status,
    median(0.50)(request_time_ms) AS p50
FROM default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707210083) AND date <= toDateTime(1707210704)
   AND env                   == 'prod' 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
GROUP BY t, status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    cache_status,
    count() / ($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND cache_status != ''
  $conditionalTest(AND env                   == $env,                  $env)
  $conditionalTest(AND hostname              == $hostname,             $hostname)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_subnet_id          == $subnet_id,            $subnet_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_node_id            == $replica_id,           $replica_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_canister_id        == '$canister_id',        $canister_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND geo_country_code      == $client_country_code,  $client_country_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND status                IN ($status_code),        $status_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND is_bot                == $is_bot,               $is_bot)
GROUP BY t, cache_status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    cache_status,
    count() / (1000 / 1000)
FROM default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707210344) AND date <= toDateTime(1707210363)
  AND cache_status != ''
   AND env                   == 'prod' 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
GROUP BY t, cache_status
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    error_cause,
    count() / ($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND error_cause NOT IN ('', 'none')
  $conditionalTest(AND env                   == $env,                  $env)
  $conditionalTest(AND hostname              == $hostname,             $hostname)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_subnet_id          == $subnet_id,            $subnet_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_node_id            == $replica_id,           $replica_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND ic_canister_id        == '$canister_id',        $canister_id)
  $conditionalTest(AND geo_country_code      == $client_country_code,  $client_country_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND status                IN ($status_code),        $status_code)
  $conditionalTest(AND is_bot                == $is_bot,               $is_bot)
GROUP BY t, error_cause
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 30) * 30) * 1000 as t,
    error_cause,
    count() / (30000 / 1000)
FROM default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1707206882) AND date <= toDateTime(1707217682)
  AND error_cause NOT IN ('', 'none')
   AND env                   == 'prod' 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
GROUP BY t, error_cause
ORDER BY t

  $conditionalTest(AND ic_subnet_id          == $subnet_id,            $subnet_id)

FROM default.http_access

GROUP BY t, geo_country_code
ORDER BY t

list.definition:
SELECT
    v.1 AS __text,
    v.2 AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT  arrayJoin([
        ('Development', 'dev'),
        ('Production', 'prod')
    ]) AS v
)
list.label: Environment
list.name: env
list.query:
SELECT
    v.1 AS __text,
    v.2 AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT  arrayJoin([
        ('Development', 'dev'),
        ('Production', 'prod')
    ]) AS v
)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT hostname
FROM http_access
WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)
    $conditionalTest(AND env == $env,  $env)
list.label: HTTP Gateway
list.name: hostname
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT hostname
FROM http_access
WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)
    $conditionalTest(AND env == $env,  $env)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ic_subnet_id
FROM http_access
WHERE 
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)
    AND ic_subnet_id != ''
list.label: Subnet ID
list.name: subnet_id
list.query:

FROM http_access
WHERE 
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)
    AND ic_subnet_id != ''

FROM http_access
WHERE 
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)
list.label: HTTP Status Code
list.name: status_code

FROM http_access
WHERE 
    $timeFilterByColumn(date)

list.definition:
SELECT
    v.1 AS __text,
    v.2 AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT  arrayJoin([
        ('Regular', '0'),
        ('Bot', '1')
    ]) AS v
)
list.label: Client Type
list.name: is_bot
list.query:

    v.1 AS __text,
    v.2 AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT  arrayJoin([
        ('Regular', '0'),
        ('Bot', '1')
    ]) AS v
